setting_nameMaxLength_name: Maximum length of the document name
setting_nameMaxLength_desp: The excess part of the document name will be hided. Only available in sub-doc menu.  If set to 0, there is no limit. Unit: Character
setting_docMaxNum_desp: When a subdocument or sibling document exceeds this value, subsequent documents are not displayed. If set to 0, there is no limit.
setting_icon_desp: Controls whether the document icon is displayed
setting_sibling_desp: When the parent document is a notebook, the sibling document is displayed
setting_docLinkClass_desp: The CSS class to which the document link belongs is used to apply siyuan's existing style class. e.g.b3-chip b3-chip--middle b3-chip--pointer
setting_popupWindow_desp: The floating window(popup window) is triggered when the mouse hovers over the area
setting_docLinkCSS_desp: Once set, the default style is also disabled
setting_parentBoxCSS_desp: If no modification, please leave it blank
setting_siblingBoxCSS_desp: If no modification, please leave it blank
setting_childBoxCSS_desp: If no modification, please leave it blank
setting_linkDivider_desp: This prefix would be added before a document link without an icon. When "popup window trigger range" set as "Icon only", prefix also used to trigger it.
setting_maxHeightLimit_name: Limit the max height of naviation container
setting_maxHeightLimit_desp: The excess part needs to be scrolled to view. Unit: em
setting_sameWidth_desp: Ensure all document links have a consistent minimum width. Set as 0 to disable. Unit: em
setting_sameWidthColumn_name: Number of document links' column with equal width
setting_sameWidthColumn_desp: In the area of sibling documents and sub-documents, enable equal-width display by setting the number of columns. Set it to 0 to disable this feature. If the number of columns does not meet your expectations, please check the "Minimum Width of Document Links" setting, as it may be affecting the layout.
setting_sameWidthColumnMobile_name: Number of document links' column with equal width (Mobile)
setting_hideIndicator_desp: Do not display 'Parent: ', 'Children: ' etc. To modify hint words, please go to the i18n/en_US.json file located in the plugin directory.
setting_adjustDocIcon_desp: Inserting the navigation pane may cause the document icon on the left side of the title to be misaligned. Enable this option to fix this issue. If it conflicts with your custom settings or theme, please disable it here.
setting_noneAreaHide_name: Hide "N/A" when there is no document
setting_noneAreaHide_desp: When there is no corresponding document, hide the section and do not display "N/A". It is not recommended to enable it at the same time as "Hide hint words".
setting_showDocInfo_name: Show the information of current document
setting_showDocInfo_desp: Document information includes: creation time, modification time, number of child-documents, total character count of subdocuments (estimated value, including OCR results, space, characters in the coding block). After disabling, you can still hover mouse over the hint words to find out the number of documents.
setting_replaceWithBreadcrumb_name: üß™Using document breadcrumbs to replace the parent document section
setting_listChildDocs_name: üß™For empty doc, user listChildDocs widget to replace the child document section
setting_listChildDocs_desp: Sorry that this widget is not fully support English yet. This widget is not integrated and needs to be downloaded separately. It's recommended that enable 'Auto Height' in the 'Global Settings' of the 'listChildDocs'
setting_previousAndNext_desp: When enabled, the previous document and the next document at the same level as this document will be obtained according to the document tree.
setting_mainRetry_desp: If unable to display, retry specified number of times with an interval of 200ms.
setting_lcdEmptyDocThreshold_desp: When the number of document blocks is less than this value, it is judged as blank document, and when it is set to -1, all documents are judged as blank documents. This setting affects only the display of listChildDocs. Unit: Number of blocks
setting_noChildIfHasAv_name: üß™No child document area when database found
setting_noChildIfHasAv_desp: When enabled, child document area are not displayed in documents found to contain databases. This feature may be removed if the custom hierarchy navigation display is updated later.
setting_showHiddenDoc_name: Show hidden documents in child area and sibling area
setting_showHiddenDoc_desp: The current positive chain display type follows this setting
setting_previousAndNextHiddenDoc_name: ‚ùåüß™Including hidden documents when fetching sibling documents
setting_previousAndNextHiddenDoc_desp: (After removal, this option will be enabled by default)To ensure the availability of the 'Previous and Next' content area and shortcut key switching functions, it is recommended to enable
setting_previousAndNextFollowDailynote_n: ‚ùåüß™Consider Recent Diary (dailynote) Dates when Retrieving Sibling Documents
setting_previousAndNextFollowDailynote_d: (After removal, this option will be enabled by default.)Currently, 'Previous and Next' are only retrieved from the same parent document, without considering the possibility of a previous diary entry. Enabling this option will attempt to retrieve the previous and next diary entries; please note that when the number of workspace notes exceeds 3000, it may cause a delay in displaying the hierarchical navigation area on low-performance devices; please note that this option only works with the new version of diaries (requires the `custom-dailynote-yyyyMMdd` attribute; if not available, please upgrade to a newer version of Siyuan (greater than v2.11.1) and use plugins like `siyuan-dailynote-today` to bulk-add this attribute to past diaries).
setting_mobileBackReplace_desp: When enabled, the plugin will attempt to replace the mobile back button logic of Siyuan to ensure that the navigation area updates when returning on Android devices (iOS not tested); this feature may not be compatible with other plugins or may encounter issues in version updates
setting_mobileRemoveAllArea_name: Remove All Content Areas on Mobile Update
setting_mobileRemoveAllArea_desp:
When enabled, the plugin will remove all content areas during updates, which can significantly reduce conflicts with other plugins and avoid duplicate content areas;
Disadvantage: it causes the navigation area not to display after 'Interval Repetition' exited
setting_doNotAddToTitle_name: ‚ùåüß™ Do Not Insert Navigation Area into HTML Element Where Document Title Resides
setting_doNotAddToTitle_desp: When enabled, the navigation area will no longer be inserted into the HTML element where the document title resides. This can prevent alignment issues with the document icon on the left side of the document title (please manually disable related settings in CSS). However, when adaptive width is enabled, the plugin will monitor and respond to width changes, which may cause lag.
setting_areaBorder_desp: Enabling this will cause the content area to shrink inward by 1px
setting_showNotebookInBreadcrumb_desp: After enabling it, the notebook name will be displayed first in the document breadcrumbs.
setting_areaHideFrom_name: Hide the content area since the xth part.
setting_areaHideFrom_desp: After setting it, the content area starting from the xth enabled part will be hidden. Use "More"/"Less" to expand or collapse. The hidden state is independent for each document, but the plugin starts with the default hidden state.. Set it to 0 to disable this feature. (The numbering is calculated based on the order set in the "Content Area and Sequence," including the hidden parts due to the "Hide 'N/A' when there is no document" setting or the parts that are not effective in the current document.)
setting_contentOrderTip_desp: This page includes the display content and order adjustment of the hierarchical navigation, distinguishing between General, Flashcard Page, and Android 3 situations
setting_openDocContentGroup_desp: You can control the order of content modules displayed when opening documents by dragging the ‚à∑ on the left side of the items below
setting_openDocContentGroup_option_sibli: This section displays documents that belong to the same document and the same level as the current document.
setting_openDocContentGroup_option_widge: The widget needs to be downloaded separately. Please use v0.2.2 and above versions. It is recommended to set listChildDocs to open automatically in the global settings. The settings for listChildDocs of plugins and widgets are isolated and do not affect each other. By default, it is displayed only when the document is blank (in other cases, it will be changed to display the sub-document area). If you want to adjust, please modify the 'Blank Document Judgment Threshold'
setting_openDocContentGroup_option_bread: Display the current document path (clickable to jump); to keep it displayed at the beginning of the editing area, please use the '(Pseudo) Document Breadcrumbs' plugin.
setting_openDocContentGroup_option_backl: Display the documents corresponding to the reverse links of the current document
setting_openDocContentGroup_option_previ: Get the previous/next document based on the document tree display order;
setting_openDocContentGroup_option_info_:
Document information includes: creation time, modification time, number of child documents, total character count of child documents (estimated value, including spaces, OCR results, code blocks); even if closed, you can still know the number of documents by hovering the mouse over the prompt word.
By using developer tools and CSS code snippets, it is possible to hide unwanted content. For more details, please consult GPT.
setting_openDocContentGroup_option_onThi: On This Day in Previous Years

(üöß Experimental feature, UNSTABLE, subject to removal at any time) Displays links to diary entries from the same month and day; this feature only works with the new version of diaries (requires the `custom-dailynote-yyyyMMdd` attribute; if not available, please upgrade to a newer version of Siyuan and use plugins like siyuan-dailynote-today to bulk-add past diaries attribute); currently, it actually displays other diary entries from the same month and day within the same notebook.
setting_openDocContentGroup_option_forwa: Displays documents referenced by the current document (Not including siyuan:// URL)
setting_removeRegStrListForLinks_name: üß™Backlinksüõá: Exclude document names matching the regular expression
setting_removeRegStrListForLinks_desp: One regular expression per line; use options gm when matching.
setting_pinRegStrListForLinks_name: üß™Backlinksüîù: Pin document names that match the regular expression
setting_pinRegStrListForLinks_desp: One regular expression per line; use options gm when matching.
setting_sortForBackLink_desp: Currently, the forward links also use this sorting order. Please note that for forward or reverse link modes set to 'document only', the natural sorting of document names is implemented by the plugin.
setting_showBackLinksType_desp: Currently the forward link display type follows this setting
setting_mobileContentGroup_desp: You can control the order of content modules displayed when opening documents on Android by dragging the ‚à∑ on the left side of the items below
setting_mobileContentGroup_option_onThis: On This Day in Previous Years
setting_flashcardContentGroup_desp: You can control the order of content modules displayed during spaced repetition by dragging the ‚à∑ on the left side of the items below
setting_flashcardContentGroup_option_blo: (üöÖ Beta feature, may be unstable, please provide feedback if any bug exist) Show the current flashcard's block hierarchy information, including only the titles or list items, and excluding the current level.
setting_hideBlockBreadcrumbInDesktop_nam: The block breadcrumb content area is not displayed on the desktop version
setting_enableForOtherCircumstance_desp: May conflict with other plugins and/or other document preview areas (or editing areas), please use with caution
setting_aboutAuthor_desp:
Translator: GPT3.5 & OpaqueGlass;
Developer: OpaqueGlassÔºõ
Feedback & sponsor: github;
Released under AGPLv3 license.
setting_settingIconTips_name: The meanings of the icons used in the settings page
setting_settingIconTips_desp:
üîÑ indicates that the meaning or effect of the setting has changed in the latest version. Please read the changelog(written in Chinese) to understand the changes and any necessary adjustments you may need to make.
üÜï indicates a newly added setting in the latest version. Please read the changelog(written in Chinese) to learn about the new feature.
üß™ or üöß indicates an experimental feature. The developer will make efforts to maintain it, but it may be removed if there are unresolvable issues.
üöÖ indicates a feature in public beta testing. When a feature has passed a small-scale test, it will be marked as such (although there may not have been many testers, so its reliability is unknown).
‚õî indicates a legacy compatibility option that will be removed soon.
setting_debugMode_name: Show detailed logs and Join alpha test
setting_debugMode_desp: When enabled, verbose logs are output in the console for debugging; It will also force enable some features in testing; enable under developer guidance and turn off for daily use.
setting_experimental: (üöß Experimental feature, UNSTABLE, subject to removal at any time)
setting_testing: (üöÖ Beta feature, may be unstable, please provide feedback if any bug exist)
error_initFailed: HierarchyNavigation Plugin initialization failed, please report this issue to developer at your convenience
is_top_document: Already at the top-level document, cannot go up.
canot_open_child_doc: Network or database delay, unable to jump to subdocument
jump_by_dailynote: The current navigation is based on the diary (daily note) order and has entered a new 'folder'.
is_hidden_doc: (The current document is a hidden document, and adjacent document information cannot be displayed)
dialog_panel_outdate_content1: We found that the following settings are different from the plugin defaults in the current settings and will be removed soon:
dialog_panel_outdate_content2: Starting from the next version, the above settings will be deleted and reset to default settings. If you still need these settings, please stay in the current plug-in version and do not upgrade.
